name: Deflecting Edge
effect: b'This card costs 1 less to activate if you control a Sword weapon.\r\nPrevent the next 3 attack damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn.'
flavor_text: b'When masterfully used, a sword can deflect any attack with minimal force.'
editions: Dawn of Ashes Alter Edition 1 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'
Dawn of Ashes First Edition 1 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'
Dawn of Ashes Starter Decks 1 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'

name: Frostsworn Paladin
effect: b'Intercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally.)\r\nOn Enter: You may banish a card with floating memory from your graveyard. If you do, draw a card and put a buff counter on Frostsworn Paladin.'
editions: Dawn of Ashes Alter Edition 2 b'ZERONEXT'

name: Nullifying Lantern
effect: b'Cards in graveyards are norm element. (They are not any other element.)'
flavor_text: b'Cleansing impurities of the soul, these lanterns are indispensable for those seeking enlightenment.'
editions: Dawn of Ashes Alter Edition 2 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'

name: Scavenging Raccoon
effect: b'On Enter: Banish up to two target cards from a single graveyard.'
flavor_text: b'Looters have conditioned these diligent creatures to scavenge the battlefield for any source of glint or glitter in exchange for a treat.'

name: Imperious Highlander
effect: b'On Enter: Imperious Highlander gets +X power until end of turn where X is the amount of allies target opponent controls more than you control.'
flavor_text: b'Against all odds and against an insurmountable front, there can be only one answer.'

name: Inspiring Call
effect: b'This card costs 2 less to activate if your champion has attacked this turn.\r\nAllies you control get +1 power until end of turn. Draw a card into your memory.'
flavor_text: b'"Aesans, rally to me! Camelot will not fall!" \r\n\xe2\x80\x94 Lorraine Allard'
editions: Dawn of Ashes Alter Edition 1 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'
Dawn of Ashes First Edition 1 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'
Dawn of Ashes Starter Decks 1 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'

name: Hasty Messenger
effect: b'On Attack: You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.'
flavor_text: b'\xe2\x80\x9cWar is upon us. Spread the word!\xe2\x80\x9d'
editions: Dawn of Ashes Alter Edition 2 b'\xe7\xa0\x82\xe6\x9c\xa8\xe7\x83\x9f'
Dawn of Ashes First Edition 2 b'\xe7\xa0\x82\xe6\x9c\xa8\xe7\x83\x9f'

name: Tide Diviner
effect: b"On Enter: Look at the top 1+LV cards of your deck. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. (LV refers to your champion's level.)
flavor_text: b"Reading the ebb and flow of the moon's sway grants insight into the currents of fate.
editions: Dawn of Ashes Alter Edition 3 b'Hori'
Dawn of Ashes First Edition 3 b'Hori'

name: Aithne, Spirit of Fire
flavor_text: b'"Let scorching embers refine your soul."'

name: Prismatic Spirit
effect: b'On Enter: Draw six cards then choose two basic elements. Prismatic Spirit gains "Inherited Effect: This object is each of the chosen elements in addition to its other elements."'
flavor_text: b'A beautiful dance of color and the enmeshment of elements make manifest its prismatic brilliance.'

name: Gate of Alterity
effect: b'REST: Put Gate of Alterity on the bottom of your champion\'s lineage then choose a class. Gate of Alterity gains "Inherited Effect: This object is the chosen class in addition to its other classes."'
flavor_text: b'A gate powered by The Grand Archive itself. It grants special privileges to champions that pass through it.'

name: Orb of Regret
effect: b'Banish Orb of Regret: Shuffle up to three cards from your hand into your deck, then draw that many cards.'
flavor_text: b'No being is truly bound to their fate, at least not when the will of the divine can be swayed.'
editions: Dawn of Ashes Alter Edition 4 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'
Dawn of Ashes First Edition 4 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'

name: Orb of Glitter
effect: b'At the beginning of your recollection phase, glimpse 1.\r\nBanish Orb of Glitter: Draw a card.'
flavor_text: b'These orbs adorn many studies of fortune-tellers. In the hands of a diviner, it is truly a tool of great power.'
editions: Dawn of Ashes Alter Edition 4 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'
Dawn of Ashes First Edition 4 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'
